text: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

translation.en: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
translation.id: Sungguh, dahulu apabila dikatakan kepada mereka, "Lā ilāha illallāh" (Tidak ada tuhan selain Allah), mereka menyombongkan diri
